description: This Java source file defines a REST controller for a Spring Boot application named tictactoebackend. It provides several endpoints including a welcome message, a redirect to API documentation via Swagger UI, a health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller that provides basic endpoints for greeting, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome string message indicating the application is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects to the Swagger UI documentation page, constructing the URL based on the incoming HTTP request.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' string indicating the application health status.
